short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will show Amazon's 70% off deals

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension shows up-to-date Amazon's 70% off deals. It allows for full integration with amazon's platform. It seamlessly integrates into chrome browser allowing the user to pick up last minute deals available in different amazons' categories.
